title: RE: lubcurl.dll is missing, so is a folder
body: So since the newest patch came out, I haven't been able to even get past the launch screen. At first, it was happening with my PBE, but I easily fixed it with the repair option. But then my live account was having the same issue, saying that there was some unspecified error. So, I tried the repair option a few times, much to everyone's surprise, it did not work. So, I went on to uninstall and reinstall it, but then it said "libcurl.dll is missing from your computer. Reinstall to fix this issue." Something along those lines. But when I went to uninstall again, it said the same thing. Eventually, one of my friends offered to help, I downloaded the Hextech Repair Tool, that didn't help. Then he was looking through his own files, and said something about a folder named "0.0.0.86" and gave me the libcurl.dll file. But I couldn't use it, because I don't have that folder. I have "0.0.0.87" instead.

replies.body: I know you mentioned trying the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) once already, but let's run that puppy again and this time make sure to run it with both **reinstall and clean uninstall** turned on. With *both* of those on, it should be able to wipe everything from League off in order to get a fresh install.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Xx0AW24d,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-01T02:51:38.727+0000)
>
> I know you mentioned trying the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) once already, but let's run that puppy again and this time make sure to run it with both **reinstall and clean uninstall** turned on. With *both* of those on, it should be able to wipe everything from League off in order to get a fresh install.

It seems like that isn't working either? I opened HRT with reinstall and clean uninstall checked, but when I looked through the task log, under the "Reinstalling" section, it shows "Downloading installer... Failed." And that seems to be the only thing that failed.

Huh.....well yea we're gonna need that step to work for sure. I'm not entirely sure what might be going wrong there without being able to see more info, so let's get you in touch with our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Make sure to grab the log files that the HRT created and send them on over in your ticket.
